Description:
Responsibilities- Check the quality of landscaping and turf (Fields of play and training pitches).
 To check on the PPM schedule and follow up on all landscaping improvement work.
 To follow up with the contractors on the PPM or ad hoc jobs. To confirm with the user for the window to carry out landscape and turf maintenance work, then monitor the PPM performance.
 Support event preparation and events as necessary.
 Any landscaping issue should be immediately escalated to the Landscaping Specialist and Cluster Manager for the site.Skills
Skills:
5 years of relevant experience
 Qualification-Diploma (Turf Management / Horticulture)
